nodes.text: The Hondo Ohnaka Pack is the twentieth villain pack for the miniatures game Star Wars: Imperial Assault from Fantasy Flight Games. It features a miniature modeled after the infamous space pirate Hondo Ohnaka. It was announced on April 13, 2018, and later released on August 23 of the same year.
Fantasy Flight Games is proud to announce the Hondo Ohnaka Villain Pack for Imperial Assault!

Heroes, Villains, Rebels, Empires, these distinctions make little difference to the respectable businessman Hondo Ohnaka. Hondo can be a dear friend or a frightful enemy, depending on the size of your pockets and is somewhat of an expert at escalating situations.

This Villain Pack contains everything you need to add Hondo Ohnaka to your Imperial Assault campaign and skirmish games! Daring missions, powerful command cards and a beautifully sculpted figure awaits you in the Hondo Ohnaka Villain Pack!
The Hondo Ohnaka Pack contains a character figurine modeled after Hondo Ohnaka, plus Command cards, and more.
